de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.base

Interface IServerXTN

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBaseExtension, IMediatrixExtension, ISSocialChannel

    public interface IServerXTN
    Describes modules in the server side that are bound at the server application.
    All constants in this interface are used by the FunctionChecker and/or other Servlets which need synchronization.

    • Method Detail

      • executeInquiry

        void executeInquiry(String function,
                  int sessionId,
                  Object data,
                  Object userObject,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                    throws SQLException
        Executes functions/inquriys.
        There is no List where all functions are mentioned,
        and you should use the API methods to get your stuff done.

        Every incoming inquiry comes to this method with a specific type of data which is for each function different.

        The class where all Mediatrix-Client functions are handled is called MediatrixServerXTN.
        Parameters:
        function - The function name which should be executed.
        sessionId - The sessionid from the incoming client-inquiry.
        data - Which may get used by the specific function.
        userObject - A BRSession - used for businessrules, can be null.
        request - The actual HTTP-Request from the caller, for example used in login-methods.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • initTableLockName

        void initTableLockName(Map<String,BigInteger> functionNameTable)
        To declare blocking methods, which should not executed parallel.

        E.g. 
         String question = Question.class.getName();
 functionNameTable.put(question + "_store", (ERPSServlet.FRAGE_STORE_FUNK));
        This map will be used by the FunctionChecker.
        Parameters:
        functionNameTable - A Map where the key is the function-name and value the unique BigInteger which will be used to synchronize the action.

      • init

        void init(javax.servlet.ServletConfig config)
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Called in the initialization process, usually by Servlets.
        Parameters:
        config - The config from the calling Servlet.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - If you have a bad configuration.

      • readObjectFromRequest

        de.ityx.base.ServletCall readObjectFromRequest(ObjectInputStream input)
                                               throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                      IOException
        To read an ServletCall from a request, this method allows you to put even more information in a request or "ServletCallWrapper".
        Parameters:
        input - To read the object to deserialize from. This InputStream actually comes from the request.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - Class of a serialized object cannot be found.
        IOException - Any of the usual Input/Output related exceptions.

      • checkFunction

        int checkFunction(Object data,
                String function,
                String sessionId,
                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                boolean release,
                Connection con)
                  throws Throwable
        Is called when a function needs to be checked.
        E.g. from Businessrules and/or Mediatrix-Extensions.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to check.
        function - Function that has been sent to server.
        sessionId - Client SessionId.
        request - The client request.
        release - currently not used.
        con - A connection (session) with a specific database.
        Returns:
        not used, should be 0.
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • getRepeatableFunctions

        Collection<de.ityx.check.RepeatableInfos> getRepeatableFunctions()
        Returns a set of RPC-Functions, which can be reply after a transaction is aborted. The set contains either the functionname (e.g storeKeyword) or the functionname with its datatype, seperated by colon. E. g. store:de.ityx.mediatrix.data.Buzzword
        Returns:
        a Collection of RepeatableInfo objects.
